description:
Hibiki`s classmate Akemi is a gloomy girl who likes collecting rocks. When she`s possessed by a Dance Stone she finds in a shrine, the fidgety movements of her fingers cause her negativity to overtake the entire town. It`s up to Hibiki and Kotone to combine their dance skills and purge her of the Dance Stone`s influence.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イジイジ踊れ!? 指先ダンス
